"Task 2: <yellow>Hit an enemy with a Rod: "・Use <%PhotonArts> to hit enemies with the Rod Weapon Action"
"・Use <%MainPaletteC> to hit enemies with the Rod Weapon Action"

"Phantom Rod can fire \"Photon Bullets\" with its weapon action, allowing it to recover PP while attacking from long range.

Charging the weapon action turns it into an area of effect attack, which is particularly effective against groups of enemies."
